dviBA#gaM braqhmaNEq tRutI#yamaqgnIdha# aiqndrO vai braqhmA vai$ShNaqvO$&gnIdyathaiqva tAvaka#lpEtAqmityathA# &&*huqryA ka#lyAqNI ba#hurUqpA sA dEyEtyathA# &&*huqryA dvi#rUqpOBaqyata#EnIq sA dEyEti# saqhasra#syaq pari#gRuhItyaiq tadvA Eqtath saqhasraqsyA&ya#na(gm) saqhasra(gg)# stOqtrIyA$H saqhasraqM dakShi#NAH 
saqhasra#sammitaH suvaqrgO lOqkaH su#vaqrgasya# lOqkasyAqBiji#tyai || 20
(aqbraqvIq - ccaq - tadaqntari#kShaM - dadAtya - cCAvAqka - Scaq dEyEti# - saqptaca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A5)
